alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:54PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Laramie County through 545 PM MDT... At 454 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carpenter, or 21 miles east of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burns and Carpenter. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 381 and 398. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
